name: Figma

unions.name: Comment
unions.comment: A comment is either a "top comment" or a reply to it.

aliases.name: CommentData
aliases.comment: A comment left by a user.
aliases.type: { id : String.String, message : String.String, fileKey : Figma.FileKey, position : Figma.Geometry.Position, user : Figma.User, createdAt : Time.Posix, resolvedAt : Maybe.Maybe Time.Posix, orderId : String.String }

aliases.name: ComponentMeta
aliases.comment: Metadata for a master component. Component data is stored in a `Document.Component` record.
aliases.type: { name : String.String, description : String.String }

aliases.name: ExportedImage
aliases.comment:
A tuple made of the node ID and the image URL of its rendered representation.

A `Nothing` value indicates that rendering of the specific node has failed. This may be due to
the node id not existing, or other reasons such has the node having no renderable components.
aliases.type: ( Figma.Document.NodeId, Maybe.Maybe String.String )

aliases.name: File
aliases.comment:
The file data returned by the server. In particular:

  - `document` is the root node of the document.
  - `components` is a mapping from node ID's to component metadata. This helps you determine
    which components each instance comes from.
aliases.type: { schemaVersion : Basics.Int, thumbnailUrl : String.String, document : Figma.Document.Tree, components : Dict.Dict Figma.Document.NodeId Figma.ComponentMeta }

aliases.name: FileKey
aliases.comment:
A file key which univocally identifies Figma document on the server.

**Note**: The _file key_ can be extracted from any Figma file URL: `https://www.figma.com/file/:key/:title`, or via the [`getFiles`][#getFiles] function.
aliases.type: String.String

aliases.name: FileMeta
aliases.comment: Metadata for a project file.
aliases.type: { key : Figma.FileKey, name : String.String, thumbnailUrl : String.String, lastModified : Time.Posix }

aliases.name: Project
aliases.comment: A single team project.
aliases.type: { id : Figma.ProjectId, name : String.String }

aliases.name: ProjectId
aliases.comment: A value which uniquely identifies a project.
aliases.type: Basics.Int

aliases.name: ReplyData
aliases.comment: A reply to a comment.
aliases.type: { id : String.String, message : String.String, fileKey : Figma.FileKey, parentId : String.String, user : Figma.User, createdAt : Time.Posix, resolvedAt : Maybe.Maybe Time.Posix }

aliases.name: TeamId
aliases.comment: A value which uniquely identifies a team.
aliases.type: String.String

aliases.name: User
aliases.comment: A description of a user.
aliases.type: { handle : String.String, imageUrl : String.String }

aliases.name: Version
aliases.comment: A version of a file.
aliases.type: { id : String.String, createdAt : Time.Posix, label : String.String, description : String.String, user : Figma.User }

aliases.name: VersionId
aliases.comment: Unique identifier for file version.
aliases.type: String.String

values.name: exportNodesAsJpeg
values.comment:
Construct a web request to export a list of document nodes into JPEG files at 1x resolution.

If you need to specify a different scale value use `exportNodesWithOptions`.
values.type: Figma.AuthenticationToken -> Figma.FileKey -> List.List Figma.Document.NodeId -> (Result.Result Http.Error (List.List Figma.ExportedImage) -> msg) -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg

values.name: exportNodesAsPng
values.comment:
Construct a web request to export a list of document nodes into PNG files at 1x resolution.

If you need to specify a different scale value use `exportNodesWithOptions`.
values.type: Figma.AuthenticationToken -> Figma.FileKey -> List.List Figma.Document.NodeId -> (Result.Result Http.Error (List.List Figma.ExportedImage) -> msg) -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg

values.name: exportNodesAsSvg
values.comment:
Construct a web request to export a list of document nodes into SVG files at 1x resolution.

If you need to specify a different scale value use `exportNodesWithOptions`.
values.type: Figma.AuthenticationToken -> Figma.FileKey -> List.List Figma.Document.NodeId -> (Result.Result Http.Error (List.List Figma.ExportedImage) -> msg) -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg

values.name: exportNodesWithOptions
values.comment:
Construct a web request to export a list of document nodes into the given `format` files using
the given `scale` factor automatically clamped within the 0.01â€“4 range.
values.type: Figma.AuthenticationToken -> Figma.FileKey -> { format : Figma.Document.ExportFormat, scale : Basics.Float } -> List.List Figma.Document.NodeId -> (Result.Result Http.Error (List.List Figma.ExportedImage) -> msg) -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg

values.name: fileDecoder
values.type: Json.Decode.Decoder Figma.File

values.name: getComments
values.comment: Construct a web request to return a list of comments left on the document.
values.type: Figma.AuthenticationToken -> Figma.FileKey -> (Result.Result Http.Error (List.List Figma.Comment) -> msg) -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg

values.name: getFile
values.comment:
Construct a web request to return the latest version of the file referred by _key_ and store it into a `File` record.

    import Http
    import Figma as F

    F.getFile ( F.personalToken "your-token" ) "your-file-key"
        |> Http.send FileReceived

Alternatively `getFile` can be chained together with another request (or any other task) resulting in a single command.

    F.getFile ( F.personalToken "your-token" ) "your-file-key"
        |> Http.toTask
        |> Task.andThen
            (\file ->
                let
                    options =
                        { format = Document.JpegFormat
                        , scale = 1.0
                        }

                    nodeIds =
                        -- Extract your node ID's from file.document here
                in
                    F.exportNodesWithOptions authToken fileKey options nodeIds
                        |> Http.toTask
            )
        |> Task.attempt NodesExported
values.type: Figma.AuthenticationToken -> Figma.FileKey -> (Result.Result Http.Error Figma.File -> msg) -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg

values.name: getFileWithVersion
values.comment: Construct a web request to return specific file version.
values.type: Figma.AuthenticationToken -> Figma.FileKey -> Figma.VersionId -> (Result.Result Http.Error Figma.File -> msg) -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg

values.name: getFiles
values.comment: Construct a web request to return the list of files of the given project.
values.type: Figma.AuthenticationToken -> Figma.ProjectId -> (Result.Result Http.Error (List.List Figma.FileMeta) -> msg) -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg

values.name: getProjects
values.comment:
Construct a web request and return the list of projects of the given team.

Note that this will only return projects visible to the authenticated user
or owner of the developer token.
values.type: Figma.AuthenticationToken -> Figma.TeamId -> (Result.Result Http.Error (List.List Figma.Project) -> msg) -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg

values.name: getVersions
values.comment:
Construct a web request to list the version history of a file. The version history
consists of versions, manually-saved additions to the version history of a file. If the
account is not on a paid team, version history is limited to the past 30 days.

Note that version history will not include autosaved versions.
values.type: Figma.AuthenticationToken -> Figma.FileKey -> (Result.Result Http.Error (List.List Figma.Version) -> msg) -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg

values.name: oauth2Token
values.comment:
Create a token to be used with the OAuth 2 authentication method.
[Read more](https://www.figma.com/developers/docs#auth-oauth).
values.type: String.String -> Figma.AuthenticationToken

values.name: personalToken
values.comment:
Create a token to be used with the Personal Access Token authentication method.
[Read more](https://www.figma.com/developers/docs#auth-dev-token).
values.type: String.String -> Figma.AuthenticationToken

values.name: postComment
values.comment:
Construct a web request to add a new comment to the document.
Return the `Comment` that was successfully posted.
values.type: Figma.AuthenticationToken -> Figma.FileKey -> { message : String.String, position : Figma.Geometry.Position } -> (Result.Result Http.Error Figma.Comment -> msg) -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg

name: Figma.Appearance

unions.name: BlendMode
unions.comment: How a layer blends with layers below.

unions.name: Effect
unions.comment: A visual effect such as a shadow or blur.

unions.name: Paint
unions.comment: A solid color, gradient, or image texture that can be applied as fills or strokes.

unions.name: StrokeAlign
unions.comment: Where stroke is drawn relative to the vector outline.

aliases.name: Blur
aliases.comment: Blur visual effect.
aliases.type: { isVisible : Basics.Bool, radius : Basics.Float }

aliases.name: ColorStop
aliases.comment: A position color pair representing a gradient stop.
aliases.type: { position : Basics.Float, color : Color.Color }

aliases.name: Gradient
aliases.comment:
A color gradient paint. In particular:

  - `start`: position of the start handle for the gradient (value 0, for the purposes of calculating gradient stops)
  - `stop`: position of the end handle for the gradient (value 1),
  - `width`: width of the gradient (only relevant for non-linear gradients)

These three values are stored in normalized object space. Normalized object space is if the top left corner of the bounding box of the object is `0, 0` and the bottom right is `1,1`.

  - `colorStops`: positions of key points along the gradient axis with the colors anchored there. Colors along the gradient are interpolated smoothly between neighboring gradient stops.
aliases.type: { isVisible : Basics.Bool, opacity : Basics.Float, start : Math.Vector2.Vec2, stop : Math.Vector2.Vec2, width : Math.Vector2.Vec2, colorStops : List.List Figma.Appearance.ColorStop, blendMode : Figma.Appearance.BlendMode }

aliases.name: Image
aliases.comment: A image-textured paint.
aliases.type: { isVisible : Basics.Bool, opacity : Basics.Float, scaleMode : Figma.Appearance.ScaleMode, blendMode : Figma.Appearance.BlendMode }

aliases.name: Shadow
aliases.comment: Shadow visual effect.
aliases.type: { isVisible : Basics.Bool, radius : Basics.Float, color : Color.Color, blendMode : Figma.Appearance.BlendMode, offset : Math.Vector2.Vec2 }

aliases.name: SolidColor
aliases.comment: Solid color paint.
aliases.type: { isVisible : Basics.Bool, opacity : Basics.Float, color : Color.Color, blendMode : Figma.Appearance.BlendMode }

aliases.name: TextStyle
aliases.comment: Character formatting.
aliases.type: { fontFamily : String.String, fontPostScriptName : String.String, isItalic : Basics.Bool, fontWeight : Basics.Int, fontSize : Basics.Float, horizontalAlign : Figma.Appearance.TextHorizontalAlign, verticalAlign : Figma.Appearance.TextVerticalAlign, letterSpacing : Basics.Float, fills : List.List Figma.Appearance.Paint, lineHeightPx : Basics.Float, lineHeightPercent : Basics.Float }

aliases.name: TextStyleOverride
aliases.comment:
Character formatting overrides.

Only relevant fields are set while specifying an override. All other fields are supposed
to be found in the master `TextStyle` record.
aliases.type: { fontFamily : Maybe.Maybe String.String, fontPostScriptName : Maybe.Maybe String.String, isItalic : Maybe.Maybe Basics.Bool, fontWeight : Maybe.Maybe Basics.Int, fontSize : Maybe.Maybe Basics.Float, horizontalAlign : Maybe.Maybe Figma.Appearance.TextHorizontalAlign, verticalAlign : Maybe.Maybe Figma.Appearance.TextVerticalAlign, letterSpacing : Maybe.Maybe Basics.Float, fills : Maybe.Maybe (List.List Figma.Appearance.Paint), lineHeightPx : Maybe.Maybe Basics.Float, lineHeightPercent : Maybe.Maybe Basics.Float }

name: Figma.Document

unions.name: BooleanOperation
unions.comment: Type of boolean operation applied to the boolean group children.

unions.name: ExportFormat
unions.comment: Format to export an asset to.

unions.name: Node
unions.comment:
A Figma document consists as tree of nodes. It starts with a
`DocumentNode`, which has one or more `CanvasNode`'s children â€” called _Pages_ in the UI â€”
which in turn contain nodes for frames, images, vector shapes, etc.

unions.name: Tree
unions.comment: Represents a multiway tree made of `Node`'s.

aliases.name: BooleanGroup
aliases.comment: A group that has a boolean operation (union, intersection, subtraction and exlusion) applied to it.
aliases.type: { id : Figma.Document.NodeId, name : String.String, isVisible : Basics.Bool, exportSettings : List.List Figma.Document.ExportSetting, blendMode : Figma.Appearance.BlendMode, preserveRatio : Basics.Bool, horizontalConstraint : Figma.Layout.LayoutHorizontalConstraint, verticalConstraint : Figma.Layout.LayoutVerticalConstraint, transitionTo : Maybe.Maybe Figma.Document.NodeId, opacity : Basics.Float, boundingBox : Figma.Geometry.BoundingBox, effects : List.List Figma.Appearance.Effect, isMask : Basics.Bool, fills : List.List Figma.Appearance.Paint, strokes : List.List Figma.Appearance.Paint, strokeWeight : Basics.Float, strokeAlign : Figma.Appearance.StrokeAlign, operation : Figma.Document.BooleanOperation }

aliases.name: Canvas
aliases.comment: A single page in a document.
aliases.type: { id : Figma.Document.NodeId, name : String.String, isVisible : Basics.Bool, backgroundColor : Color.Color, exportSettings : List.List Figma.Document.ExportSetting }

aliases.name: Component
aliases.comment: A reusable component node. It has the same fields of `Frame`.
aliases.type: Figma.Document.Frame

aliases.name: Document
aliases.comment: The root node of a document.
aliases.type: { id : Figma.Document.NodeId, name : String.String, isVisible : Basics.Bool }

aliases.name: ExportSetting
aliases.comment: Format and size to export an asset at.
aliases.type: { suffix : String.String, format : Figma.Document.ExportFormat, constraint : Figma.Document.ExportConstraint }

aliases.name: Frame
aliases.comment: A node of fixed size containing other nodes.
aliases.type: { id : Figma.Document.NodeId, name : String.String, isVisible : Basics.Bool, backgroundColor : Color.Color, exportSettings : List.List Figma.Document.ExportSetting, blendMode : Figma.Appearance.BlendMode, preserveRatio : Basics.Bool, horizontalConstraint : Figma.Layout.LayoutHorizontalConstraint, verticalConstraint : Figma.Layout.LayoutVerticalConstraint, transitionTo : Maybe.Maybe Figma.Document.NodeId, opacity : Basics.Float, boundingBox : Figma.Geometry.BoundingBox, clipContent : Basics.Bool, layoutGrids : List.List Figma.Layout.LayoutGrid, effects : List.List Figma.Appearance.Effect, isMask : Basics.Bool }

aliases.name: Group
aliases.comment: A logical grouping of nodes.
aliases.type: { id : Figma.Document.NodeId, name : String.String, isVisible : Basics.Bool, backgroundColor : Color.Color, exportSettings : List.List Figma.Document.ExportSetting, blendMode : Figma.Appearance.BlendMode, preserveRatio : Basics.Bool, horizontalConstraint : Figma.Layout.LayoutHorizontalConstraint, verticalConstraint : Figma.Layout.LayoutVerticalConstraint, transitionTo : Maybe.Maybe Figma.Document.NodeId, opacity : Basics.Float, boundingBox : Figma.Geometry.BoundingBox, clipContent : Basics.Bool, layoutGrids : List.List Figma.Layout.LayoutGrid, effects : List.List Figma.Appearance.Effect, isMask : Basics.Bool }

aliases.name: Instance
aliases.comment:
An instance of a component. Changes to the original component result
in the same changes applied to the instance.
aliases.type: { id : Figma.Document.NodeId, name : String.String, isVisible : Basics.Bool, backgroundColor : Color.Color, exportSettings : List.List Figma.Document.ExportSetting, blendMode : Figma.Appearance.BlendMode, preserveRatio : Basics.Bool, horizontalConstraint : Figma.Layout.LayoutHorizontalConstraint, verticalConstraint : Figma.Layout.LayoutVerticalConstraint, transitionTo : Maybe.Maybe Figma.Document.NodeId, opacity : Basics.Float, boundingBox : Figma.Geometry.BoundingBox, clipContent : Basics.Bool, layoutGrids : List.List Figma.Layout.LayoutGrid, effects : List.List Figma.Appearance.Effect, isMask : Basics.Bool, componentId : Figma.Document.NodeId }

aliases.name: NodeId
aliases.comment: A value which uniquely identifies a node in the document.
aliases.type: String.String

aliases.name: Rectangle
aliases.comment: A rectangular vector shape.
aliases.type: { id : Figma.Document.NodeId, name : String.String, isVisible : Basics.Bool, exportSettings : List.List Figma.Document.ExportSetting, blendMode : Figma.Appearance.BlendMode, preserveRatio : Basics.Bool, horizontalConstraint : Figma.Layout.LayoutHorizontalConstraint, verticalConstraint : Figma.Layout.LayoutVerticalConstraint, transitionTo : Maybe.Maybe Figma.Document.NodeId, opacity : Basics.Float, boundingBox : Figma.Geometry.BoundingBox, effects : List.List Figma.Appearance.Effect, isMask : Basics.Bool, fills : List.List Figma.Appearance.Paint, strokes : List.List Figma.Appearance.Paint, strokeWeight : Basics.Float, strokeAlign : Figma.Appearance.StrokeAlign, cornerRadius : Basics.Float }

aliases.name: Slice
aliases.comment: A rectangular region of the canvas that can be exported.
aliases.type: { id : Figma.Document.NodeId, name : String.String, isVisible : Basics.Bool, exportSettings : List.List Figma.Document.ExportSetting, boundingBox : Figma.Geometry.BoundingBox }

aliases.name: Text
aliases.comment: A text box.
aliases.type: { id : Figma.Document.NodeId, name : String.String, isVisible : Basics.Bool, exportSettings : List.List Figma.Document.ExportSetting, blendMode : Figma.Appearance.BlendMode, preserveRatio : Basics.Bool, horizontalConstraint : Figma.Layout.LayoutHorizontalConstraint, verticalConstraint : Figma.Layout.LayoutVerticalConstraint, transitionTo : Maybe.Maybe Figma.Document.NodeId, opacity : Basics.Float, boundingBox : Figma.Geometry.BoundingBox, effects : List.List Figma.Appearance.Effect, isMask : Basics.Bool, fills : List.List Figma.Appearance.Paint, strokes : List.List Figma.Appearance.Paint, strokeWeight : Basics.Float, strokeAlign : Figma.Appearance.StrokeAlign, characters : String.String, style : Figma.Appearance.TextStyle, characterStyleOverrides : List.List Basics.Int, styleOverrides : Dict.Dict Basics.Int Figma.Appearance.TextStyleOverride }

aliases.name: Vector
aliases.comment:
A vector network, consisting of vertices and edges. This data structure
is reused multiple times to represent lines, regular polygons, stars and other
document elements.
aliases.type: { id : Figma.Document.NodeId, name : String.String, isVisible : Basics.Bool, exportSettings : List.List Figma.Document.ExportSetting, blendMode : Figma.Appearance.BlendMode, preserveRatio : Basics.Bool, horizontalConstraint : Figma.Layout.LayoutHorizontalConstraint, verticalConstraint : Figma.Layout.LayoutVerticalConstraint, transitionTo : Maybe.Maybe Figma.Document.NodeId, opacity : Basics.Float, boundingBox : Figma.Geometry.BoundingBox, effects : List.List Figma.Appearance.Effect, isMask : Basics.Bool, fills : List.List Figma.Appearance.Paint, strokes : List.List Figma.Appearance.Paint, strokeWeight : Basics.Float, strokeAlign : Figma.Appearance.StrokeAlign }

values.name: children
values.comment: Return the children of a tree as a list.
values.type: Figma.Document.Tree -> List.List Figma.Document.Tree

values.name: foldl
values.comment: Fold over all the nodes in a tree, left to right, depth first.
values.type: (Figma.Document.Node -> b -> b) -> b -> Figma.Document.Tree -> b

values.name: node
values.comment: Return the node of a tree.
values.type: Figma.Document.Tree -> Figma.Document.Node

values.name: singleton
values.comment: Creates a singleton tree. This corresponds to `tree v []`.
values.type: Figma.Document.Node -> Figma.Document.Tree

values.name: toRosetree
values.comment:
Return a Rosetree data structure, which can be used with
the [Elm Rosetree package](http://package.elm-lang.org/packages/zwilias/elm-rosetree/latest).
values.type: Figma.Document.Tree -> Tree.Tree Figma.Document.Node

values.name: tree
values.comment: Construct a tree from a node and a list of children.
values.type: Figma.Document.Node -> List.List Figma.Document.Tree -> Figma.Document.Tree

unions.name: Position
unions.comment:
Specify a position: either the absolute coordinates on the canvas
or a relative offset within a frame.

Curently used only for comments.

aliases.name: BoundingBox
aliases.comment: A rectangle expressing a bounding box in absolute coordinates.
aliases.type: { x : Basics.Float, y : Basics.Float, width : Basics.Float, height : Basics.Float }

aliases.name: Point
aliases.comment: A 2D point.
aliases.type: { x : Basics.Float, y : Basics.Float }

name: Figma.Layout

unions.name: GridAlign
unions.comment:
Positioning of grid within the parent container.

  - `MinAlign`: grid starts at the top (or left) of the container, filling the minimun space possible. The margin is applied before the grid.
  - `CenterAlign`: grid is center aligned. Margin value is ignored.
  - `MaxAlign`: grid stretches from the top (or left) to the bottom (or right) of the container, filling the maximun space possible. The margin is applied before and after the grid.

unions.name: LayoutGrid
unions.comment: Guides to align and place objects within a parent container.

unions.name: LayoutHorizontalConstraint
unions.comment: Horizontal constraint relative to containing frame.

unions.name: LayoutVerticalConstraint
unions.comment: Vertical constraint relative to containing frame.

aliases.name: Columns
aliases.comment: A vertical grid made of columns.
aliases.type: { width : Basics.Float, isVisible : Basics.Bool, color : Color.Color, gutter : Basics.Float, margin : Basics.Float, count : Basics.Int, align : Figma.Layout.GridAlign }

aliases.name: Grid
aliases.comment: A square grid.
aliases.type: { width : Basics.Float, isVisible : Basics.Bool, color : Color.Color }

aliases.name: Rows
aliases.comment: A horizontal grid made of rows.
aliases.type: { height : Basics.Float, isVisible : Basics.Bool, color : Color.Color, gutter : Basics.Float, margin : Basics.Float, count : Basics.Int, align : Figma.Layout.GridAlign }
